title: "A Rise In Biased Job Language Is Not Helping Tech's Lack Of Diversity"
excerpt: "Despite all of the large tech companies having made statements and promises around their diversity initiatives, their job descriptions say otherwise. According to data from Textio, biased language in job postings for big tech companies has increased 70% in the past 3 years."
